sentence.Network_en: But truly, forsooth, I find it hard to believe him the same man.
sentence.Network_cn: 不过, 说老实话, 我简直不敢相信他就是那同一个人呢.

means.word_mean: 1. an archaic word originally meaning `in truth' but now usually used to express disbelief
